com.github.zk1931.jzab

Class FileUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.zk1931.jzab.FileUtils

  • public final class FileUtils
extends Object
    A static class that contains file-related utility methods.

    • Method Summary

      Atomically move one file to another file.

    • Method Detail

      • writeLongToFile

        public static void writeLongToFile(long value,
                   File file)
                            throws IOException
        Atomically writes a long integer to a file. This method writes a long integer to a file by first writing the long integer to a temporary file and then atomically moving it to the destination, overwriting the destination file if it already exists.
        Parameters:
        value - a long integer value to write.
        file - file to write the value to.
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs.

      • readLongFromFile

        public static long readLongFromFile(File file)
                             throws IOException
        Reads a long integer from a file that was created by the writeIntToFile method.
        Parameters:
        file - file to read the integer value from.
        Returns:
        the long integer value in the file
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs.

      • writePropertiesToFile

        public static void writePropertiesToFile(Properties prop,
                         File file)
                                  throws IOException
        Atomically writes properties to a file. This method writes properties to a file by first writing it to a temporary file and then atomically moving it to the destination, overwriting the destination file if it already exists.
        Parameters:
        prop - a Properties object to write.
        file - file to write the value to.
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs.

      • readPropertiesFromFile

        public static Properties readPropertiesFromFile(File file)
                                         throws IOException
        Reads the Properties from a file that was created by the writePropertiesToFile method.
        Parameters:
        file - file to read the Properties object from.
        Returns:
        the Properties object in the file
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs.

      • atomicMove

        public static void atomicMove(File source,
              File dest)
                       throws IOException
        Atomically move one file to another file.
        Parameters:
        source - the source file.
        dest - the destination file.
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs.
